alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 8:58PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN DOUGLAS AND NORTH CENTRAL WASHBURN COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM CDT... At 858 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Solon Springs, or 25 miles southeast of Superior, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Solon Springs around 905 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Gordon and Wascott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
